epic: ProcureSight+ Integration into Appian Core Solutions

stories.story_name: Refactor ProcureSight Site Tab Search Functionality
stories.acceptance_criteria: **GIVEN**: A user is on the ProcureSight Site tab **WHEN**: They enter search terms and click search **THEN**: Results are displayed using the new ProcureSight+ backend API and procurement results interface

stories.story_name: Enable Procurement Summary View with Navigation Links
stories.acceptance_criteria: **GIVEN**: A user clicks on a procurement result card **WHEN**: The procurement summary loads **THEN**: All procurement data displays with clickable links to Vendor Summary and Codes Summary views

stories.story_name: Implement Save to Requirement and Add to Collection Actions
stories.acceptance_criteria: **GIVEN**: A user views procurement search results **WHEN**: They click 'Save to Requirement' or 'Add to Collection' **THEN**: The procurement is saved to the specified location and accessible from the appropriate tab

stories.story_name: Restructure Requirement Summary Insights Tab Navigation
stories.acceptance_criteria: **GIVEN**: A user accesses the Requirement Summary **WHEN**: They view the tab structure **THEN**: The tabs are organized as Research, Bookmarks, Search, Documents, and Best in Class with proper navigation

stories.story_name: Integrate Native AI Document Chat Functionality
stories.acceptance_criteria: **GIVEN**: A user clicks on a document from search results **WHEN**: The document opens **THEN**: They can interact with the document using the Native AI Chat interface provided by ProcureSight+ Module

stories.story_name: Update Collections Tab UX and Structure
stories.acceptance_criteria: **GIVEN**: A user accesses the Collections tab **WHEN**: They view a collection **THEN**: The collection summary displays with Bookmarks, Documents, and Insights tabs as per the updated UX mockup

stories.story_name: Implement Global Search with Recent Searches Display
stories.acceptance_criteria: **GIVEN**: A user opens the Search tab **WHEN**: The page loads **THEN**: The global search interface displays with recent searches shown below the search input

stories.story_name: Enable Procurement Results Filtering and Expanded Filter Set
stories.acceptance_criteria: **GIVEN**: A user performs a procurement search **WHEN**: Results are returned **THEN**: The results display with an expanded filter set allowing users to refine their search criteria
